articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Arrives
   Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan led by Ri Ki Sok, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here Tuesday to visit the socialist homeland on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
